Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

evertime when i try to update KSP, there comes this Error: 

04/25/2016 10:08:31 PM [INFO    ]: Squad Patcher 2.1.1.270 (c4c2f8f-production b master) - Apollo I Edition
04/25/2016 10:08:31 PM [INFO    ]: ---------------
04/25/2016 10:08:31 PM [INFO    ]: OS: Windows (win)
04/25/2016 10:08:31 PM [DEBUG   ]: Handing everything over to Qt. Hold onto your butts.
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [DEBUG   ]: Crash?
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [INFO    ]: >>> Preparation
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [INFO    ]: Detecting if OS-resident rsync is present...
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [WARNING ]: rsync is not already installed, so making use of bin\rsync.exe.
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [INFO    ]: >>> Authentication
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [INFO    ]: Getting login token...
04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [DEBUG   ]: HTTPFetcher()

04/25/2016 10:08:38 PM [DEBUG   ]: GetFormData() = username=***************&hash=cdc068e72dc179709f1d008bc5c96bdf&patchermd5=da5b63f03a841d83fdfa83e8cc19873b&platform=WindowsPlayer&clientsversion=2.1.1.270&act=get_rsync_token&buildTarget=KSP_win&platID=win&password=%2A739779D1AD13654A8B7A7F7B8694C7E9FE8533F0&experimental=0
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [DEBUG   ]: Downloading data from https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/dp/patcher/index.php to memory...
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [DEBUG   ]: HTTP 200: OK (https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/dp/patcher/index.php)
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [DEBUG   ]: Content-Length: ??? bytes
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [DEBUG   ]: Received: 175e0da5-b65d-4ee6-8da0-015afdb3ff50
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [DEBUG   ]: getAuthToken=175e0da5-b65d-4ee6-8da0-015afdb3ff50
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [INFO    ]: Your session token is 175e0da5-b65d-4ee6-8da0-015afdb3ff50.
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [INFO    ]: >>> Synchronization
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [INFO    ]: Opening connection to kerbalspaceprogram.com:873 with transport RSYNC...
04/25/2016 10:08:39 PM [DEBUG   ]: bin\rsync.exe -zrav --progress -p rsync://****************@kerbalspaceprogram.com:873/kerbalsp.production/KSP_win/ "/cygdrive/e/KerbalSpaceProgramm 1.05"
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [INFO    ]: rsync asked for authentication, responding...
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [INFO    ]: receiving incremental file list
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: 0 [main] rsync (6984) E:\KerbalSpaceProgramm 1.05\bin\rsync.exe: *** fatal error - cygheap base mismatch detected - 0x2934400/0x27B4400.
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: This problem is probably due to using incompatible versions of the cygwin DLL.
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: Search for cygwin1.dll using the Windows Start->Find/Search facility
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: and delete all but the most recent version.  The most recent version *should*
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: reside in x:\cygwin\bin, where 'x' is the drive on which you have
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: installed the cygwin distribution.  Rebooting is also suggested if you
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: are unable to find another cygwin DLL.
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: 0 [main] rsync 3224 fork: child -1 - forked process 6984 died unexpectedly, retry 0, exit code 0xC0000142, errno 11
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: rsync: fork failed in do_recv: Resource temporarily unavailable (11)
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: rsync error: error in IPC code (code 14) at main.c(897) [Receiver=3.1.2]
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [ERROR   ]: rsync exited with code 14: Error in IPC code
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [DEBUG   ]: Process_stderr canceled [0]
04/25/2016 10:08:40 PM [DEBUG   ]: Canceled [0]

04/25/2016 10:09:00 PM [WARNING ]: Process closing.  Cleaning up...
04/25/2016 10:09:05 PM [DEBUG   ]: Set windows file permissions for E:\KerbalSpaceProgramm 1.05

i searched for the file "cygwin1.dll" and deleted it, but it doesnt work...

 

Need Help!

(sry for the bad english )
The patcher has been broken for the last couple of versions. You need to manually download and install the whole game from the store. Be sure to backup your saves if you want to keep them.
